title: After wiping head in wudu should I wet my hands again to wipe my ears? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: so if I'm making then I take some water and wet my hands to wipe my head but then after I wipe my head my my hands became dry so then must I take a new water to like uh wipe over my ears No need no need to do that the the water that was in your hands is sufficient it's not 100 percent dry there'd still be some dampness in your fingers and that would be would suffice to wipe your ears do not take new water for that the prophet said the ears are part of the head so wiping your head immediately wipe your ears as well with the same uh hands without taking new water
